column5: Provides an alternative login method using Google OAuth for faster access.
Allows authenticated users to change their current password from the account settings for security purposes.
Enables the admin to view and track all payment transactions processed on the platform.
Allows customers to request and admins to process refunds for applicable fees or orders.
Allows the admin to review a list of user-submitted feedback and comments.
Grants the admin authority to remove inappropriate or resolved feedback from the system.
Provides the admin with a dashboard of key platform KPIs (users, orders, revenue, driver status, etc.).
Allows the system or an administrator to send notifications to users regarding orders, promotions, or important updates.
